title: Nevv-England pesecutors [sic] mauled vvith their own vveapons giving some account of the bloody laws made at Boston against the kings subjects that dissented from their way of worship : together with a brief account of the imprisonment and tryal of Thomas Maule of Salem, for publishing a book entituled Truth held forth and maintained, &c. / by Tho. Philathes.
author: Maule, Thomas, 1645-1724.
notes: Ms. notes attributing author and imprint information on endpapers;  also attributed by Wing to Maule.
